ts_1.name: Arief Purnama Muharram
ts_1.title: AMV UI IS A GREAT PLACE
ts_1.description: AMV UI is a great place where you not only learn how to create sophisticated marine robots, but also work together as an extraordinary team as well. Because as a T.E.A.M. Together Everyone Achieve More.

ts_2.name: Alif Hikmah
ts_2.title: AMV UI IS A GREAT PLACE
ts_2.description: My four years of college felt very productive, and I didnâ€™t regret it because being busy at AMV UI was beneficial during campus and post-campus. What is certain is that the environment is supportive of progressing and developing.

ts_3.name: Irfan Rahadi
ts_3.title: AMV UI IS A GREAT PLACE TO DEVELOP NEW THINGS
ts_3.description: Being part of AMV UI are choices that I will not regret. Using knowledge that has been taught for creating new technology is the most interesting thing. Every international and national competition is what we are waiting for.

ts_4.name: Grace Missrani
ts_4.title: AMV UI GETTING BETTER EACH DAY
ts_4.description: The thing that I never regretted during my studies was joining AMV. In this team, I found many new friends who have the same vision and mission fot improving AMV for the better. Very proud of the team and the people at AMV who boast of the name of Indonesia. We hope that you will make AMV even better than it is today, to get better achievements than it is now.

ts_5.name: Fadhil Azharrisman
ts_5.title: AMV UI IS THE RIGHT PLACE TO GIVE WHAT WE HAVE IN A HAND
ts_5.description: AMV UI is a great place where you not only learn how to create sophisticated marine robots, but also work together as an extraordinary team as well. Because as a T.E.A.M. Together Everyone Achieve More.
